entry.title: æˆ‘çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç«
entry.content: æˆ‘çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« Â¶æˆ‘çš„äºŒç¯‡æ–‡ç« Â¶æˆ‘çš„ç¬¬ä¹é¡µä¹Ÿé—®ä»–è¿˜åœ¨é‚£ æˆ‘çš„æ¢¦çš„æ˜¯æ˜¾ç¤ºæ‰“æ³•é£žæœºå®‰é˜²ç›‘æŽ§é“¾æŽ¥å‘å¡ä»˜æ¬¾jafkjsklfkadf fkadjksfjkdjkjasdjflkjkdjskfkaj æˆ‘çš„æ¢¦åŽ»å¼€å‘ çš„ç©ºæ°” åŒ—äº¬çš„å¤©æ°”ååˆ†è®¨åŽŒ åŒ—äº¬æ¬¢è¿Žä½ é›¨æžœçš„ä½œå®¶ adskfkajfslkjklaj æµ·å› æ‰§è¡Œ åœ°çƒ äºšæ´² ä¸­å›½ å¹¿ä¸œ å¹¿å·ž æ¢…å·ž æ·±åœ³ å¹¿å·ž å¹¿å·ž|æ¯å‘¨|æ·±åœ³ :-----|-----ðŸ˜:â€“: 1|2|3 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118package com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.rescuespot.video;import android.os.Bundle;import android.view.SurfaceView;import android.view.View;import android.widget.Button;import android.widget.LinearLayout;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.R;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.base.App;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.base.BaseActivity;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.util.LogUtil;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.util.ToastUtil;import butterknife.BindView;import butterknife.ButterKnife;import io.agora.rtc.Constants;import io.agora.rtc.IRtcEngineEventHandler;import io.agora.rtc.RtcEngine;import io.agora.rtc.video.VideoCanvas;public class SpotVideoActivity extends BaseActivity { @BindView(R.id.btFinish) Button btFinish; @BindView(R.id.btJoin) Button btJoin; @BindView(R.id.llVideoLoc) LinearLayout llVideoLoc; @BindView(R.id.llVideoRemote) LinearLayout llVideoRemote; private RtcEngine rtcEngine; @Override protected int getContentViewId() { return R.layout.activity_spot_video; } @Override protected void initView(Bundle savedInstanceState) { if (rtcEngine != null) { return; } try { rtcEngine = RtcEngine.create(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext(), "f88d96cb86394031b7698883369b1b3c", new IRtcEngineEventHandler() { @Override public void onJoinChannelSuccess(String channel, int uid, int elapsed) { super.onJoinChannelSuccess("onJoinChannelSuccess", uid, elapsed); LogUtil.d(TAG, channel + " uid:" + uid); } @Override public void onFirstRemoteVideoDecoded(int uid, int width, int height, int elapsed) { ToastUtil.showMessage("onFirstRemoteVideoDecoded" + " uid:" + uid); } }); //æ‰“å¼€è§†é¢‘æ¨¡å¼ rtcEngine.enableVideo(); rtcEngine.disableAudio(); rtcEngine.setVideoProfile(Constants.VIDEO_PROFILE_360P, false); rtcEngine.joinChannel(null, "beijing", null, 1); SurfaceView asvVideoLoc = rtcEngine.CreateRendererView(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext()); rtcEngine.setupLocalVideo(new VideoCanvas(asvVideoLoc, VideoCanvas.RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN, 1)); llVideoLoc.addView(asvVideoLoc); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } btFinish.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); finish(); } } }); btJoin.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { SurfaceView asvVideoRemote = rtcEngine.CreateRendererView(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext()); rtcEngine.setupRemoteVideo(new VideoCanvas(asvVideoRemote, VideoCanvas.RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN, 2)); llVideoRemote.addView(asvVideoRemote); } }); } @Override protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); // TODO: add setContentView(...) invocation ButterKnife.bind(this); } @Override protected void onDestroy() { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); } super.onDestroy(); } @Override public void onBackPressed() { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); } super.onBackPressed(); }}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Â¶Quick Start Â¶Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Â¶Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Â¶Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Â¶Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
